## Loading and preprocessing the data
### Unzip Data File
```{r}
if(!file.exists("activity.csv"))
{
  unzip("activity.zip")
}
```
### Load data
```{r}
dataActivity <- read.csv("activity.csv")
```


### Some summary statistics
```{r}
summary(dataActivity)
```
